alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 15 at 3:37AM EDT until July 16 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.4 to 12.8 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA, Eastern Plymouth MA, Barnstable MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...From 11 pm this evening until 3 am Saturday morning when another very high astronomical tide occurs. * IMPACTS...Splashover and very minor coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. Wave action will likely cause some washover onto coastal roads around the time of high tide. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Gloucester Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 15/01 PM 10.1/10.6 0.6/ 1.1 0.2/ 0.8 2 None 16/01 AM 11.3/11.8 1.8/ 2.2 0.2/ 0.7 2 Minor 16/02 PM 10.1/10.6 0.6/ 1.1 0.2/ 0.8 2-3 None 17/02 AM 11.1/11.6 1.6/ 2.0 0.2/ 0.7 2 Minor 17/03 PM 10.1/10.6 0.6/ 1.1 0.2/ 0.8 1-2 None Merrimack River near Newburyport MA MLLW Categories -
